##Initialisation

```{r}
library(CreDating)
library(ape)
set.seed(0)
data(harris2010)
plot(harris2010$tree, show.tip.label = F)
axisPhylo(backward = F)
```

##Root-to-tip analysis

Let's do a root-to-tip regression analysis:

```{r}
res=roottotip(harris2010$tree,harris2010$dates,predInt = 'gamma')
```

##Analysis

We run CreDating as follows:

```{r}
res=credate(harris2010$tree,harris2010$dates,nbIts = 10000,model='gamma')
plot(res,show.tip.label = F)
```

Plot with credibility bars:
```{r}
plot(res,'treeCI',show.tip.label = F)
```


We can see what the MCMC traces look like:

```{r}
  plot(res,'trace')
```
